name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast
display_help: Blast villains with an array of offensive, long range Psionic powers. While few living beings can resist their effects, Creatures without minds, like machines and robots, are not affected as strongly.

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Mental_Blast
powers.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -37.50% strength to recharge for 6s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Subdue
powers.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 80.00% chance for 3.0 immobilize for 8.94s on target
80.00% chance for 3.0 immobilize for 2s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psionic_Lance
powers.display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psychic_Scream
powers.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -62.50% strength to recharge for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Telekinetic_blast
powers.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 8.3 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 8.3 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Will_Domination
powers.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 80.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 23.84s on target after 0.25s delay
80.00% chance for 3.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psionic_Tornado
powers.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback

display_info: 5 ticks of 6.43 psionic damage over 4.1s on target
-37.50% strength to recharge for 10s on target
50.00% chance for 1.4 magnitude knockup on target
5 ticks of 8.06 psionic damage over 4.1s on target
50.00% chance for 1.4 magnitude knockup on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Scramble_Thoughts
powers.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving them dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Psychic_Blast.Psychic_Wail
powers.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes which deals Extreme Psionic damage. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: -87.50% strength to recharge for 20s on target
